title.narrative: Support to the Maritime transport sector in Africa; Improvement of port safety and port efficiency

description.narrative: The purposes of this contract are as follows: Support national maritime administrations and port authorities, the regional port association and the private sector to enhance port safety and security, including planning of implementing strategies and actions to enhance safe handling and storage of goods and security in ports. Support port authorities in enhancing port efficiency, in particular in the area of special port and terminal planning, vehicle circulation inand around ports and in c

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

description.narrative: Although the programme has a strong focus in Western and Central Africa, the application to other regions should be possible as well.

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
